content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetStackMetrics path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/storage/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/metrics content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name starttime
desc the start date for the range of metrics
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name endtime
desc the end date for the range of metrics
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
sum get stack metrics
desc when the start  end dates are not provided the metrics for the last day will be returned
the date range used must be at least a day apart and only beginning times are allowed eg 20190101t000000
responses
200
prometheusmetrics
type obj
props
prometheusmetricsstatus
type str
default success
desc a metrics querys resulting status
metricsdata
type obj
props
datamatrix
type obj
results
type arr
datamatrixresult
type obj
props
metric
type str
desc the data points labels
values
type arr
datavalue
type obj
props
unixtime
type str
desc the time that a data point was recorded
value
type str
desc a data points value
desc an individual metric data point
desc time series data point values
desc time series containing a range of data points over time for each time series
desc a data points value
desc a set of time series containing a range of data points over time for each time series
datavector
type obj
results
type arr
datavectorresult
type obj
props
metric
type str
desc the data points labels
datavalue
type obj
props
unixtime
type str
desc the time that a data point was recorded
value
type str
desc a data points value
desc an individual metric data point
desc time series containing a single sample for each time series all sharing the same timestamp
desc a data points value
desc a set of time series containing a single sample for each time series all sharing the same timestamp
desc the data points in a metrics collection
errortype
type str
desc the type of error encountered when querying for metrics
error
type str
desc the error encountered when querying for metrics
warnings
type str
desc warnings encountered when querying for metrics
desc a collection of metrics
title: 13_Metrics_GetStackMetrics_73.json
